about_the_game:
Move fast, think faster!

Times Trials is an intense, arcade-style block-dropping puzzle game that will supercharge your math skills.



Your goal is simple: arrange the falling number blocks to form rows or columns that equal the target number. As the blocks keep falling, you’ll need lightning-quick thinking to make it through.



Race against the clock in timed mode or go head-to-head against friends in versus battles. Choose from four operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division.



This game caters to all skill levels, making it a perfect choice for students and math enthusiasts alike. Whether you’re a beginner looking for a fun way to practice or a pro looking for a challenge, Times Trials is right for you.

Get ready to multiply the fun and add to your skills with Times Trials!
